info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 08 at 3:47PM MDT until July 08 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM MDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL DOUGLAS...SOUTHWESTERN ARAPAHOE AND EAST CENTRAL JEFFERSON COUNTIES... At 346 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over southeastern Littleton, or 11 miles south of Denver, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. Spotters have reported quarter sized hail with this storm. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. This severe storm will be near... Louviers around 350 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Highlands Ranch, Greenwood Village, Sedalia, southwestern Centennial, Lone Tree, Castle Pines and northwestern Parker. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
